subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Manny Ramirez, who is serving a Major League Baseball suspension for using a banned drug, went hitless in two at-bats for the Class AAA Albuquerque Isotopes.
snippet: Manny Ramirez, who is serving a Major League Baseball suspension for using a banned drug, went hitless in two at-bats for the Class AAA Albuquerque Isotopes.
